amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report assessing the billing practices of the Department of Defense for care received under the TRICARE program and at military medical treatment facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2186 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2186 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4188) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report assessing the billing practices of the Department of Defense for care received under the TRICARE program and at military medical treatment facilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2186 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2186 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
